short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You personal studymate equipped with AI power. Help you solve your homework and illustrate your study material 24/7.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

🚀 Improve your learning ability with AI Tutor from UpStudy. UpStudy facilitate deeper learning experiences by providing personalized support and feedback.

✅ Cut, click and get what you want
📖 Let UpStudy be your homework helper. Are you tired of checking and searching your homework answers? Just cut and click to get the comprehensive answers and explanations you need.
💬 Engage in a deep discussion with your reading material
💡 Are you struggling with the  study materials? Are you confused about your reading materials? Don't worry! Just upload and give your instruction, AI boosts your learning capacity efficiently.

🤔 Start a new way when you are browsing webpage!
💭 Select what interests you and explore more information on each webpage. Start a new journey of acquiring knowledge.

💻 How To Use 
▶️ Click the “Add to Chrome” button and pin it to the toolbar.
▶️ Log in to your account. 
▶️ Press Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+U to wake up UpStudy.
▶️ Equipped with the AI Engine.

❓FAQs
 📢 Is it free to use?
 - Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can go premium. 

 📢 Is my UpStudy Premium Subscription active on both the mobile and UpStudy Chrome Extension version? Quick subscription link：https://upstudy.ai/premium
 - Yes, your UpStudy premium is available on mobile and Chrome Extension.
 
 📢 Can I use AI assistance on my phone?
 - Yes. UpStudy is available on all devices (Chrome Extension, iOS, Android). Search up "UpStudy" in the App Store/Google Play Store.
 
Contact Us 
Email:  support@upstudy.ai
Website: https://upstudy.ai
